div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 850 Byrsine, Thrace, 1938 Burial: c. 290-280 B.C. (Price) Contents: 43 AR Alexander III: 1 early post. tetradrachm (Babylon) 34 dr. (Asia Minor mints) Philip III: 6 dr. (Asia Minor mints) Lysimachus: 1 lifetime tetradr. 1 dr. (Alexander type) Disposition: Athens Varoucha, BCH 1938, p. 446
